300  // *********************** BULK_READ METHODS *************************** //
301 
302 
303  /* Bulk Reads the following values in one instruction
304  *
305  * - Present Position
306  * - Present Velocity
307  * - Present Current (or load if MX Series)
308  *
309  * @param servo_ids Pointer to a list of ID's to respond. Dynamixels will respond in order of list index
310  * @param responses Pointer map of dynamixel ID's to dynamixel response vectors, response vectors are a list of
311  * parameter values in the order given above.
312  * @return True on comm success, false otherwise
313  */
314  bool getBulkStateInfo(std::vector<int> *servo_ids,
315  std::map<int, std::vector<int32_t> > *responses);
316
